showerReviews.reviewText: My fiance had her surprise Bridal shower here and the people at the center were so helpful to her sister (who planned the event )throughout the entire process and they were very accommodating on the day of as well. If you live in Havertown …
I attended a baby shower at this Recreation Center and it has an Amazing Staff.  The center is very clean and easy to find.  I would highly recommend.
